nodes.text: The trap at Fluwhaka was a battle fought between the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic against the Dark Jedi during the Hundred-Year Darkness. It took place at the world of Fluwhaka, and was a ambush set up by the Jedi and Republic intending to trap the Dark Jedi; however, the Force-centered military tactics of Karness Muur prevented it from succeeding.
